question.title: What is the main occupational aetiologies of occupational asthma?

option_a.title: Physical agents and chemical agents
option_a.description: Agents that are not related to the respiratory system

option_b.title: Biological agents and physical agents
option_b.description: Agents that are related to the respiratory system

option_c.title: Chemical agents and physical agents
option_c.description: Agents that are related to the respiratory system

option_d.title: Biological agents and chemical agents
option_d.description: Agents that are related to the respiratory system
